actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the establishment of a Federal motor vehicle safety standard with respect to rear lighting.

summary.text: Requires, under the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act, the establishment of a Federal motor vehicle safety standard with respect to rear lighting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the establishment of a Federal motor vehicle safety standard with respect to rear lighting.
